text: Can Anyone post an example where a .gz file is read, decompressed, and the saved as unzipped file? I tried GZip package. But the documentation is very short. Thanks!

elements.text: Can Anyone post an example where a .gz file is read, decompressed, and the saved as unzipped file? I tried GZip package. But the documentation is very short. Thanks!

text:
```using CodecZlib
open(GzipDecompressorStream, f, "r") do src
    open("decompressed", "w") do sink
        write(sink, src)
    end
end```

elements.text:

    end

text:
Effective (if weird) solution
```using DataDeps: unpack
unpack("myfile.gz")```
(DataDeps wraps 7zip.jll)
Thank you guys for the prompt help! I used CodecZlib.jl and it worked. One minor correction to <@U67SCG4HG>’s code, “GzipDecompressorstream” is “GzipDecompressorStream”
